about.short:
The European Political Strategy Centre, the European Commission's in-house think tank, took the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Treaties of Rome to reflect on the European story.

Examining the goals and principles which have underpinned sixty years of integration, the time has now come to think in earnest about the future direction our joint project should take.

This is your space to join the debate on the #FutureOfEurope and share with us and others your hopes and aspirations – both for the EU itself but also for your own life and that of future generations. So let's look forward together to build a better Europe.

content.whitePaperText:
The White Paper presented by the European Commission on 1 March 2017 sets out possible paths for the future of Europe.

It offers five scenarios for the Union's evolution. Which one will become reality depends on the choices we will make.

Read the White Paper on the Future of Europe
